sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFDocumentContentHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Helper class which helps in creating DocumentContentFields and DocumentContentElements</description>
        <name>LFDocumentContentHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFDocumentContentHelper = Class.create();

LFDocumentContentHelper.PLAIN_TEXT_TYPE = 'plain';
LFDocumentContentHelper.HTML_TEXT_TYPE = 'html';

LFDocumentContentHelper.createField = function(originalValue, translatedValue) {
    return new LFDocumentContentField(originalValue, translatedValue);
};

LFDocumentContentHelper.createElement = function(groupName, label) {
    return new LFDocumentContentElement(groupName, label);
};

LFDocumentContentHelper.prototype = {
    type: 'LFDocumentContentHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-11 09:52:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>aaedfbad0f003010c0774ee7c8767e5b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LFDocumentContentHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">a4dd193447720210cd4e1ce4316d4312</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_aaedfbad0f003010c0774ee7c8767e5b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-05-13 12:19:27</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
